Description: Click on Add Product to Cart (Quantity 1)
result: The product will be added to the cart and the price will be updated accordingly.

Description: Click on Add Product to Cart (Quantity 0)
result: The site will display an error.

Description: Click on Add product to cart (quantity greater than 1)
result: The site will update the cart and display the updated price when several products of the same type are added (will update the price per quantity * price per unit)..

Description: We clicked on Add product to cart (quantity number greater than 1) but there is not enough stock of the product according to what the user entered.
result: The site will ask the user to change the quantity of products to a different quantity..

Description: Click on Add Product to Cart (quantity greater than 1) and then click on Add Product again.
result: The product will be added to the cart and the price will be updated accordingly.
